snippet: The Brady Center to Prevent Gun Violence filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against a firearm classifieds Web site on Wednesday, apparently the first time legal action was taken against online gun sales.
abstract: Brady Center to Prevent Gun Violence files wrongful-death lawsuit agains firearm classifieds Web site Armslist.com, contending that it facilitated illegal purchase of handgun used to kill Jitka Vesel in Illinois.
lead_paragraph: The Brady Center to Prevent Gun Violence filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against a firearm classifieds Web site on Wednesday, apparently the first time legal action was taken against online gun sales.

headline.main: Illinois: Online Gun Site Is Sued
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Online Gun Site Is Sued

keywords.value: Brady Center to Prevent Gun Violence
keywords.name: organizations
